name: TinyReminder

screenshots.caption: The main window (set for regular reminders)
The reminder window  (showing the repeated reminder)
Hovering on the pink icon (this color means the repeated reminder)
The context menu of the icon in the system tray
The main window (set for an one-time reminder)
Hovering on the green icon (this color means the one-time reminder)

short_description:
(Translations needed - see Wiki for the details.)

Tiny reminder with very simple user interface and no instalation, for people, who have no time to learn how to use it.

Reminds once by chosen time period or repeatedly on regular time intervals basis.

Elements of the interface dynamically changes to give the user instant grafical feedback of his or her action.

Even after launching the reminder, all chosen settings may be dynamically changed by double clicking the icon in the system tray.

NOTE: It requires Java Runtime Environment 5 or higher.
summary: Tiny reminder with very simple user interface and no installation
